general_advisory: Provide light irrigation to paddy nursery. Keep provision of critical irrigation for rabi crops. survey for insect pest attack and take necessary steps. Complete earthing up in rabi crops. Due to weather there is chances of powdery mildew in various crops, to manage spray sulphur powder @ 1 kg in 200 liters of water.

advisory: Due to weather there will be severe infestation of aphids, spray Imidachloprid or Dimethoate @ 2 ml/lt.
Provide one irrigation at critical stage at flowering and pod development stage.
Go for final land preparation and apply 35 - kg DAP, 20 -kg MOP and 8 -kg Urea per acre during last puddling as basal fertilizer. After 48 hours of application of fertilizer again provide irrigation
Transplanting of 25 -30 days old seedlings should be done.
Due to weather there is chances of stem borer attack, to manage this spray Triazophos @ 2 ml/liter of water.
Provide critical stage irrigation to the crop.
Survey for any insect.
Apply 12 -16 kg Nitrogen/acre
This is right time for sowing of maize.
Delay in maize sowing will hamper the pollination due to high temperature.
Without delay sow maize @ 6 kg per acre.
Apply 10 kg Chlorpyriphos per acre in termite prone area.
Go for sowing sesamum like Prachi, G -10, Kalika @ 3 kg/acre.
Treat the seeds for protection of soil born and seed born disease.
Apply 12 -8-8 kg NPK/acre with Sulphur 10 kg as basal dose.
Complete sowing the summer groundnut at 30 X 10 cm spacing.
Seed rate is 50 kg pod/ac.
In the early sown crop, do not go for intercultivation after flowering.
Prepare the field and apply 2 t of FYM/ac at final land preparation.
Transplant the ragi seedling of 21 days old at a spacing of 22.5 X 10 cm.
In cucurbots, chances of Downy Mildew, manage this apply Macozeb @ 2.5 g/liter of water.
Provide the feed mixture according to the body weight.
Keep clean the poultry house.
